item.title: Trump's tennis invite from Rolex echoes Apple, Nvidia playbook for currying favor, Warren says
item.description: Trump placed a 39% levy on Switzerland's exports, and Warren questioned if Rolex was vying for an exemption from the tariffs.

item.title: Europe's work-life balance a key talent draw as Trump revamps H-1B visa
item.description: Research from recruitment company Randstad suggests work-life balance has soared in importance for employees worldwide.
